editorialNotes.standard: The start of golden hour is no longer a guessing game thanks to Lumy. This simple but elegant tool helps maximize your time, tracking information for sunrise, sunset, and more across all your devices.
editorialNotes.short: Find the best time for taking the perfect shot.

ios.subtitle: See In The Dark - True Vision

editorialNotes.standard: With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates, and customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.

name: TV Cast Pro for Samsung TV

ios.subtitle: Best add date, GPS to video

editorialNotes.short: AirSnap’s remote control function makes sure no one has to ever be left out of a group photo.
editorialNotes.standard: With Free App of the Week, we highlight a great app you can enjoy at no charge this week. (In-App Purchases sold separately.) Wherever your photography takes you, Camera Plus gets you closer to the perfect shot. Smart focus settings let you capture breathtaking macro images with ease, while an ingenious remote control feature uses another device’s camera to set up natural-looking selfies, group shots, and even videos. With one-touch editing, optional captions, and stylish filters to choose from, Camera Plus is also fantastic for adding the finishing touches to your pictures.

ios.subtitle: Get a clean feed for OBS
Capture video and get drawn in

editorialNotes.standard: Shooting movies on film may be a dying art, but just because we live in the digital age doesn’t mean we have to abandon our analog past. We get warm, nostalgic fuzzies from 8mm Vintage Camera’s grainy, flickery film filters and lens effects, conjuring up memories of vacation travelogues screened in wood-paneled basements. It’s not just about old-school kicks, though—this powerful suite of tools can give any video an authentic period look.
editorialNotes.short: The easy way to create authentic vintage movies.

ios.subtitle: Sparkle Effects Video Filters

editorialNotes.standard: Stickers, filters, frames, fonts—this photo editor gives us so many cute ways to dress up our baby pics. It’s great for making birth announcements and party invites everyone will admire, or just precious images to share with loved ones.
